post.text: Parents just want to give their kids a better life. That's what growing up in small business families meant for Tim and Hillary. We're going to keep fighting so every family has that opportunity.

comment.author: Charlie
comment.text: Count down to your trial in front of a grand jury Hillary. I suggest you try claim mental illness and you might get a reduced sentence.

replies.author: Heather
replies.text: Dee Bird You're too young to know what the Clintons really are. Watch the video and listen to the people who do.
